price: So those whose scales [of good deeds] are heavy, it is they who will be successful.
arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
